page.title: 08Sundays by Heather Brown
page.content: On Sundays all of my family go to have a swim at the swimming baths and play games in the big pool.Sometimes my sister and I go into the little swimming pool to play.The lady in charge sometimes tells us off and sends us back into the big pool again. We get out at ten o'clock and Mum and Sam get us each a drink of anything we want and crisps and sweets to eat if we want as well.We all go home and my Mum cooks us our Sunday lunch.We mostly have chicken or roast beef and roast potatoes.We have a pudding like apple crumble.In the afternoon on Sundays we don't do much until teatime.We only have a small tea because we have had a big lunch.Then I go to bed about half past nine.
